name: Hades Nebula
summary: Hades Nebula is a futuristic vertical scrolling shooter set in the year 2124. As humanity searches for new habitable planets due to dwindling energy reserves, players pilot a small spacecraft on a mission to thwart the villainous Emperor Hades. The game unfolds against a backdrop of interstellar colonization and conflict, with players navigating through asteroid fields and waves of enemy forces. Gameplay focuses on skillful dodging and precise shooting, while power-ups enhance the ship's capabilities. With its blend of sci-fi narrative and classic arcade action, Hades Nebula offers a challenging space combat experience as players fight to secure humanity's future among the stars.
